mapper.select: select c.comments_number,c.comments_datetime,c.comments_content,c.user_number,c.post_number,u.user_id from tbl_comments c,tbl_post p,tbl_user u where c.post_number=p.post_number and c.user_number=u.user_number group by c.comments_number order by c.comments_datetime desc

select c.comments_number,c.comments_datetime,c.comments_content,c.user_number,c.post_number,u.user_id from tbl_comments c,tbl_post p,tbl_user u where c.post_number=p.post_number and c.user_number=u.user_number group by c.comments_number order by c.comments_datetime desc limit #{startIndex},1

select c.comments_number,c.comments_datetime,c.comments_content,c.user_number,c.post_number,u.user_id from tbl_comments c,tbl_post p,tbl_user u where c.post_number=p.post_number and c.user_number=u.user_number and p.user_number=#{userNumber} group by c.comments_number order by c.comments_datetime desc
